external_games.name: Penguin no Mondai X: Tenkuu no 7 Senshi
Penguin no Mondai X: Tenkuu no 7 Senshi

name: Penguin no Mondai X: Tenkuu no 7 Senshi
summary: Penguin no Mondai: Tenkuu no 7 Senshi is an adventure game was released on the Nintendo DS on July 23, 2009 in Japan only and was developed and published by Konami. It is the second game based on the anime of the same name.
